static makeQueryOrLoop ($field, $array)
 

Detailed Description

This class uses the basicCRUD class to handle the vast majority of the administration of database entries. This class will provide coverage of the majority of entry administration tasks and can then be extended as needed for more specific cases.

string$hostORpathip or name of host (in the case of mysql or pgsql) or file path to db (in case of sqlite, firebird)
string$portadditional param where you can specify the port
